dtliExcerpt: What saves 'The Velocity of Autumn' from terminal cuteness is the unforced naturalness of the relationship between Estelle Parsons and Stephen Spinella, who play Alexandra and her son Chris with a mixture of irritation and affection that rings completely true.
bwwExcerpt: Eric Coble breaks the U.S. record for clichés per minute in 'The Velocity of Autumn,' his new cranky-codger two-character comedy...Not even the best efforts of Estelle Parsons and Stephen Spinella can justify this stupefying exercise in déjà vu, which wears out its welcome in five minutes flat, followed by 85 minutes of soul-shriveling tedium.
showScoreExcerpt: What saves 'The Velocity of Autumn' from terminal cuteness is the unforced naturalness of the relationship between Estelle Parsons and Stephen Spinella, who play Alexandra and her son Chris with a mixture of irritation and affection that rings completely true.
